title: Club to learn new champs
body:
I've just started to learn how to play Fiora, and I realised that norms isn't the best place. Too much toxicity. So I decided to create a new club (sorry if there is already one for this, I couldn't find it).

Looking for players that want to learn a new champ or just chill without toxicity, the idea being to play custom games (still PvP) with people on discord (if you want to). Rank is not important. Toxicity will result in being kicked.

Add me in-game if you're interest. IGN: TwoHeadedFreak
